text: @senatemajldr @LindseyGrahamSC The American people deserve to have Congress focus on COVID-19 and dealing with the resulting financial crisis. Not rewriting history from 3 years ago. This is why the GOP Is going to get its clock cleaned in 2020. Red meat for the base. Nothing for the American people.
